Induced by Financial Prospects
But many are attracted into the canvassing work to sell books and pictures that do not express our faith, and do not give light to the purchaser. They
94
are induced to do this because the financial prospects are more flattering than those that can be offered them as licentiates. These persons are obtaining no special fitness for the gospel ministry. They are not gaining that experience which would fit them for the work. They are not learning to bear the burden of souls and daily obtaining a knowledge of the most successful way of winning people to the truth. They are losing time and opportunities.
